meta.article_title: November 18, 2013 - Three Reasons Players Miss Against Deep Sidespin and Topspin Serves

three-reasons-players-miss-against-deep-.probleme: Players miss against deep sidespin and topspin serves
causes_communes: Do not adjust to the amount of spin on the ball
Do not take into account that their contact point is usually closer to the table than in a rally
Lift breaking sidespin serves off the end

debutant.probleme: Do not adjust to the amount of spin on the ball
debutant.solution: Aim lower because the ball will jump off your paddle faster with topspin or sidespin

debutant.probleme: Do not take into account that their contact point is usually closer to the table than in a rally
debutant.solution: Contact the ball more on top of the ball, especially when looping

exercices_complementaires.description: Have a partner serve while you just receive; then switch roles and practice returning different serves

metriques_progression: Consistency, control, depth, and placement are king
erreurs_a_eviter: Lifting the ball off the end when reaching for it
